docs.title: Documentation
docs.description: Comprehensive documentation for the Statigo web framework covering routing, middleware, caching, i18n, templates, configuration, and CLI.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Introduction to Statigo framework and its key features including static-first architecture, multi-language routing, and built-in SEO optimization.

getting_started.title: Getting Started
getting_started.description: Step-by-step guide to setting up a new Statigo project from scratch with Go, including configuration and basic routing.

routing.title: Routing
routing.description: Learn how to configure multi-language URL routes, SEO features like canonical URLs and hreflang tags, and dynamic routing in Statigo.

middleware.title: Middleware
middleware.description: Comprehensive guide to Statigo's middleware pipeline including logging, compression, rate limiting, IP banning, and security headers.

caching.title: Caching
caching.description: Understanding Statigo's two-tier caching system with memory and disk persistence, caching strategies, and invalidation methods.

i18n.title: Internationalization (i18n)
i18n.description: Complete guide to adding multi-language support with JSON translations, URL routing, and language detection.

templates.title: Templates
templates.description: Using Go's html/template package with Statigo, including template functions, partials, and passing data to templates.

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: Environment variables, routes.json, redirects.json, and translation files configuration for Statigo applications.

cli.title: CLI (Command Line Interface)
cli.description: Using Statigo's CLI for pre-rendering pages, clearing cache, and creating custom commands.

docs.not_found_message: The documentation page you're looking for doesn't exist.

home.title: Welcome to Statigo
home.description: Statigo is a production-ready Go web framework for building fast, SEO-optimized, multi-language websites with static-first architecture and built-in caching.
home.heading: Build Fast, SEO-Optimized Websites
home.subheading: Statigo is a production-ready Go web framework with caching, i18n, and SEO built-in.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Two-tier caching with Brotli compression delivers sub-millisecond response times.

seo.title: SEO Optimized
seo.description: Canonical URLs, hreflang tags, structured data, and sitemaps out of the box.

i18n.title: Multi-Language Ready
i18n.description: Built-in internationalization with URL-based language routing.

notfound.title: Page Not Found

notfound.heading: Page Not Found
notfound.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
